title: someone is hacking me and my friend
body: today i signed on league and is said that my account has been recently signed on a different computer then i called my friend on skype and he tolled me that i sent him a link (even though i wasnt online at the time)and it hacked his account and changed his password now he cant sign on. also i remember getting a link from someone on my friends list for a free blitzcrank skin this is the link i was given **[Link Removed]** this is what probably what did it. someone from riot help me and my friend

replies.body:
Send in a ticket with the info you wrote here and they'll ask for some info about your account and you should be back on the rift soon!

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new

Also, please remove that link. We don't want anyone else to get their accounts hacked. :p Good luck!
I went ahead and removed the link to ensure no one else accidentally clicks on it.  If you haven't already, make sure that you submit that ticket!
